attributes.action: promote the construction of high density housing (flats) in urban areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of housing (Renting and buying) is soaring, putting pressure on wages & increasing the separation between the haves and the have-nots. An agressive campaign (with supporting legislation) to promote the construction of high-quality, reasonably priced high-density urban housing, well serviced by public transport systems, will provide much needed shelter & privacy for Britain's working population.
